context: Global consumer goods company (10,000 employees) facing increased regulatory scrutiny and social media risks

request.purpose: Develop comprehensive crisis communication protocol and training program
request.justification: Recent product recall highlighted gaps in crisis response capabilities

decision_process.outcome: Identified key crisis types: product safety, data breach, executive misconduct
Comprehensive protocol covering detection, response, and recovery phases
Training program for 200 key personnel with annual refresh cycles

business_impact.expected_benefits: Faster crisis response times, reduced reputational damage, improved stakeholder trust
business_impact.projected_roi: Intangible - brand protection and regulatory compliance
